title: Bug 18268 - Not Finding Images and Files in NL-specific Subdirectories
description: When starting Eclipse, the software is not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories as expected. This issue occurs in build 200205291235. To reproduce, follow the steps below.
OB: When you open the about dialog, observe that there is a main image.
EB: When you open the about dialog, you should see the main image. The software should correctly handle the '$nl$' path segment and display the image from the NL-specific subdirectory.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Exit Eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> down into an NL-specific subdirectory, i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif>.
3. Start Eclipse again.
